name: Deathleaper
leaderRules: This model cannot be your WARLORD.

abilities.name: FIGHTS FIRST
abilities.description: Fights First — This model fights at the start of the Fight phase; when it fights it resolves its attacks before models that do not have this ability.

abilities.name: INFILTRATORS
abilities.description: Infiltrators — This unit has the Infiltrators core ability (a deployment ability from the core rules).

abilities.name: LONE OPERATIVE
abilities.description: Lone Operative — This unit has the Lone Operative core ability (see core rules).

abilities.name: STEALTH
abilities.description: Stealth — This unit has the Stealth core ability (see core rules).

abilities.name: SYNAPSE
abilities.description: Synapse — This model is a synapse creature. (Synapse is a Tyranids faction rule; synapse effects influence friendly TYRANIDS units.)

abilities.name: FEEDER TENDRILS
abilities.description: Feeder Tendrils — Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: FEAR OF THE UNSEEN (AURA)
abilities.description: Fear of the Unseen (Aura) — While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1. In addition, in the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if such an enemy unit is below its Starting Strength, it must take a Battle-shock test.

abilities.name: HUNTER ORGANISM
abilities.description: Hunter Organism — This model cannot be your WARLORD.
